summary: Completed comprehensive testing of OhCampus counseling platform NEW FEATURES. Backend APIs working correctly with 85% success rate. Frontend new features fully functional including course filtering, college comparison, year/semester-wise fees, admission charges, and total fees summary.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 instead of expected 201 for resource creation
Returns 200 instead of expected 201 for resource creation
Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access

ui_bugs.issue: College cards show skeleton loading state for extended periods
ui_bugs.workaround: Cards eventually load and functionality works

passed_tests: Course filter dropdown in dashboard with 23 course options (NEW FEATURE)
Course filtering functionality - filters colleges by selected course (NEW FEATURE)
Compare Colleges button enables comparison mode (NEW FEATURE)
College selection for comparison (up to 4 colleges) (NEW FEATURE)
Compare page with side-by-side college comparison (NEW FEATURE)
Comparison sections: Highlights, Courses, Fees, Admission Charges (NEW FEATURE)
College detail page address display in header (NEW FEATURE)
Fees tab with year-wise and semester-wise fee structure (NEW FEATURE)
Admission Charges section with one-time fees (NEW FEATURE)
Total Fees Summary with Grand Total excluding hostel (NEW FEATURE)
Admin Fee Management 'Add Tuition/Hostel Fee' button (NEW FEATURE)
Admin Fee Management 'Add Admission Charges' button (NEW FEATURE)
Fee type selection (Annual/Semester) in admin panel (NEW FEATURE)
Year/Semester selection when adding fees (NEW FEATURE)
API /api/filters includes courses list (NEW FEATURE)
API /api/colleges/compare returns comparison data for 4 colleges (NEW FEATURE)
API /api/colleges/:id/fee-summary returns fee totals (NEW FEATURE)
API /api/admission-charges endpoints working (NEW FEATURE)
Backend authentication for counselor and admin users
Database with 8 colleges, 22 courses, 24+ fee records, 4+ admission charges
Counselor login redirects to /dashboard
Admin login functionality
Dashboard search and filter components
College detail pages with all tabs functionality
